item.title: Linux | SSL Certificate with Certbot
item.description: Requirements Debian, Apache2, Snapd, Certbot Install Install certbot sudo apt update && sudo apt install certbot --classic Run certbot command sudo certbot --apache you can change “–apache” to “–nginx” if you are using nginx instead of apache Getting the Cert Enter your valid email address so certbot can contact you for renewal and security notices agree all the T&Cs enter your domain name that’s it ‚úåüèΩ
